title: Reasons I hate this games ranked system.
body:
#1 takes for fucking ever to rank up, yah 250-500 ranked games a season sounds legit. 
#2 fucking afks ruining it every time you're doing well. 
#3 fucking smurfs. Yah sorry I havent been playing since season 2 and am not diamond 2. 
#4 you have to abuse shit in order to climb. 

Any way see you all, I'll be playing litterally any other fucking game.
